name: Questionable Markup
description:
Questionable Markup is a simultaneous-turn retail sales game. Research the market's tendencies and use your intuition to figure out what products sell, then use that knowledge to beat out the competition.

  • Undercut your rivals' prices to try to steal their sales, or raise your prices to squeeze every last dollar out of the market
  • Compete with your opponents on sure-fire hit products or try to buy something off-beat to corner the market for it
  • Simultaneous turns replicate the uncertainties of the business world, forcing you to rely on your intuition to guess your opponents' actions and counter appropriately
  • Upgrade your store and advertise your products to gain the upper hand over your competition
  • Play with up to 4 players in network or hotseat multiplayer, or play against the AI

Featuring Music by Matthew Pablo
http://www.matthewpablo.com
